verses.verse: I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and he <S%H5186>inclined<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>, and heard my <S%H7775>cry<s%>.

He brought me <S%H5927>up<s%> also out of a <S%H7588>horrible<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%>, out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H2916>clay<s%>, and <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> upon a <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H3559>established<s%> my <S%H838>goings<s%>.

And he has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, even <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>, and fear, and shall <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is that <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H7760>makes<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H4009>trust<s%>, and <S%H6437>respects<s%> not the <S%H7295>proud<s%>, nor such as turn <S%H7750>aside<s%> to <S%H3577>lies<s%>.

<S%H7227>Many<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, are your <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works which you have <S%H6213>done<s%>, and your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> which are to <S%H6186>us-ward<s%>: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto <S%H5046>you<s%>: if I would declare and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of <S%H6105>them<s%>, they are more than can be <S%H5608>numbered<s%>.

<S%H2077>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering<s%> you did not <S%H2654>desire<s%>; my <S%H241>ears<s%> have you <S%H3738>opened<s%>: burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and sin <S%H2401>offering<s%> have you not <S%H7592>required<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H935>I<s%>, Behold, I come: in the <S%H4039>volume<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> it is written of <S%H3789>me<s%>,
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H8451>Yes<s%>, your law is <S%H8432>inside<s%> my <S%H4578>heart<s%>.

I have <S%H1319>preached<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>: <S%H3607>behold<s%>, I have not refrained my <S%H8193>lips<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you <S%H3045>know<s%>.

I have not <S%H3680>hid<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>inside<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>; I have <S%H559>declared<s%> your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and your <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.

<S%H3607>Withhold<s%> not you your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> from <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord: let your <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> preserve <S%H5341>me<s%>.

For <S%H4557>innumerable<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> have <S%H661>surrounded<s%> me <S%H5771>about<s%>: my iniquities have taken <S%H5381>hold<s%> upon <S%H3201>me<s%>, so that I am not able to look <S%H7200>up<s%>; they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>: therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> fails <S%H5800>me<s%>.
Be <S%H7521>pleased<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>: O Lord, make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to help <S%H5833>me<s%>.

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> <S%H5472>it<s%>; let them be driven <S%H268>backward<s%> and put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> that <S%H2655>wish<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
Let them be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> for a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H1889>me<s%>, Aha, <S%H1889>aha<s%>.

Let all those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H157>you<s%>: let such as love your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%>.

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>; yet the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>thinks<s%> upon <S%H5833>me<s%>: you are my help and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>; make no <S%H309>delay<s%>, O my <S%H430>God<s%>.
